query:
-- Find atolls with islands that have guides
SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.name, COUNT(p.id) as island_count
FROM atolls a
JOIN places p ON a.id = p.atollId
WHERE p.type = 'island' AND p.atollId IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY a.id, a.name
ORDER BY island_count DESC;
